name: Agentic Mattermost
description: This plugin provide Agentic capabilities to mattermost chats

settings.help_text: The API key for OpenAI, required for the plugin to function.
Specify the OpenAI model to use (e.g., gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-4).

Define AI tasks as a JSON map where keys are task names and values are prompt templates. Use {{.Messages}} as a placeholder for concatenated chat messages. Example: {"summarize_chat": "Summarize this conversation: {{.Messages}}"}
